subject: Re: HTML Testrunner
msgSnippet: Yup, that is indeed what Ive done.  I ll clean it up, package it and publish it in the files section and we ll go from there. Kindest regards, Andrew. ...
messageBody:
Yup, that is indeed what Ive done. I'll clean it up, package it and
publish it in the files section and we'll go from there.

Kindest regards,
Andrew.

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Elliotte Rusty Harold <elharo@m...> wrote:
> Andrew Wilson wrote:
> > Hi,
> >
> > Ive written an HTML JUnit test runner. Like the text runner, but
> > generates HTML.
>
> Why implement this as a new Runner class? It seems easier to do as a
> TestRunListener implementation. Or is this what you've done?
>
> --
